thread.title: Deutsche Bank Names Frank Kuhnke as Operations Chief

author: Jenny Strasburg
title: Deutsche Bank Names Frank Kuhnke as Operations Chief
text:
Deutsche Bank AG named longtime operations executive Frank Kuhnke as chief operating officer under new Chief Executive Christian Sewing, replacing Kim Hammonds, whose departure comes amid a high-level reshuffling at the German lender.
Mr. Kuhnke has been at Deutsche Bank since 1986, most recently as chief control and administrative officer for the private and commercial bank, the retail-banking division Mr. Sewing oversaw before he was named CEO earlier in April.
...
